text: Gabriel-Maximilien Leuvielle (16 December 18831 November 1925), known professionally as Max Linder (), was a French actor, director, screenwriter, producer and comedian of the silent film era. He was known aas the "first international movie star"Waldekranz, Rune: Filmens Historia - Del 1, p. 208 (P.A. Norstedt & Söners Förlag, Stockholm) and "the first film star anywhere". ==References== Category:1883 births Category:1925 deaths Category:Drug-related suicides Category:French movie actors Category:French movie directors Category:French screenwriters Category:French movie producers Category:French comedians
title: Max Linder
